name: raspbian_cloud9
desc: SSH connections are available with passwords for the 'pi' user.
SSH connections are available with keys for the 'root' user.
SSH connections from the internal network use the port 22.
SSH connections from the external network use the port 220NN and the public_ip piNN.seduce.fr (NN, node number, node-NN).
The cloud9 interface is available at https://piNN.seduce.fr/ide.html. Login: admin
